mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_reply (id, created_at, modified_at, is_deleted, comment, user_id, qna_comment_id) VALUES (#{id}, now(), now(), #{isDelete}, #{comment}, #{userId},#{qnaCommentId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, created_at, modified_at, is_deleted, comment, user_id, qna_comment_id FROM qna_reply WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at ASC, id ASC
